root.name: Bejeweled Twist
root.description: System RequirementsOS: Windows XP/VistaDirectX Version: DirectX 8 or laterProcessor: 1.2GHz processorMemory: 256MB of RAM (512+MB recommended)Graphics Card: DirectX-compatible video with 32MB of video memorySound: DirectX Compatible Sound CardHard Drive: 250MB of free hard drive space
